alert.note: Alert for Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:18PM PST until January 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northeast winds will cause local blowing snow. A brief period of of light freezing rain is possible Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.
